metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27823 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in OpenJPEGâ€™s encoder. This flaw allows an attacker to pass specially crafted x,y offset input to OpenJPEG to use during encoding. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to confidentiality, integrity, as well as system availability.

criterions.comment: blender: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ghostscript: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
